name: Burncoin
description: Burn Coin ($BURN) is a permission-less fully onchain gamified cryptocurrency built on the Ronin Blockchain. $BURN combines mining mechanics, referral incentives, and NFT integration to deliver a play-to-earn and hold-to-earn hybrid experience. Features unique NFT mining system with hash power voting on protocol revenue allocation, monthly halving tokenomics, and LP staking mechanisms to burn token supplies.

contracts.label: ERC20 $BURN Contract
contracts.description: The ERC20 contract for $BURN tokens, supporting transfers and basic token utilities.

contracts.label: ERC1155 Contract
contracts.description: The ERC1155 contract representing in-game items or assets, supporting batch operations.

contracts.label: Game Contract
contracts.description: Handles the claiming system for rewards and game mechanics.

contracts.label: Lock Contract
contracts.description: Manages the lock and unlock mechanism for $BURN tokens.

contracts.label: NFT Contract
contracts.description: Handles staking and upgrading of miners.
